text.text_translated:
Sometimes a bridge falls down. At first, people do not know why. Engineers study the bridge very carefully. Then they find the reason.
Sometimes, the material in the bridge was low quality. Or an important part had a problem.
In other cases, the bridge was built for a certain weight. It could not hold more weight than that.
